params.paraId: The parachain to forward funds to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.evmAddress: The EVM address to receive tips on PassetHub
params.name: The parachain name
params.substrateAddress: The substrate address (SS58 encoded as bytes32)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: The amount of USDC to tip (including fee)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateFee(uint256).notice: Calculate fee for a tip amount

forwardToParachain(uint32).notice: Forward accumulated tips to parachain EVM address

registerParachain(uint32,string,string,a.notice: Register a new parachain for tipping

tipParachain(uint32,uint256,string).notice: Tip a parachain with bridged USDC
